title: How to Make Deity in Little Alchemy 2: Complete Guide

steps.title: Combine Human + Immortality to create Deity.
steps.content: Combine Human + Immortality to create Deity. Keep in mind you must have the Myths and Monsters DLC purchased. You can create this element with or without Time , which is unlocked by discovering at least 100 elements. [1] X Research source Here's the fastest way to create Deity: With Time : Water + Earth = Mud Air + Air = Pressure Earth + Pressure = Stone Mud + Stone = Clay Water + Water = Puddle Puddle + Puddle = Pond Pond + Pond = Lake Lake + Lake = Sea Earth + Sea = Primordial soup Primordial soup + Time = Life Clay + Life = Human Human + Immortality = Deity Without Time : Water + Earth = Mud Air + Air = Pressure Earth + Pressure = Stone Mud + Stone = Clay Water + Water = Puddle Puddle + Puddle = Pond Pond + Pond = Lake Lake + Lake = Sea Earth + Sea = Primordial soup Fire + Fire = Energy Primordial soup + Energy = Life Clay + Life = Human Human + Immortality = Deity

steps.title: Deity can be created with other combinations of elements.
steps.content: Deity can be created with other combinations of elements. You can create Deity with any of the following combinations: Human + Peach of immortality Human + Philosopher's stone Human + Fountain of youth Human + Elixir of life

steps.title: Deity can be used to create other elements.
steps.content: Deity can be used to create other elements. Combine Deity with other elements to create new ones. Deity + Wind or Air = Aeolus Deity + Good = Angel Deity + Cat = Beast Deity + Bat = Camazotz Deity + Moon = Chang'e Deity + Snake/Dinosaur/River/Waterfall = Chinese dragon Deity + Egg = Cosmic egg Deity + Galaxy/Universe/Galaxy cluster/Solar system/Space = Cthulhu Deity + Love/Angel = Cupid Deity + Evil = Demon Deity + Fruit/Wine/Beer/Alcohol/Drunk = Dionysus Deity + Tree/Forest/Orchard = Dryad Deity + Horse = Epona Deity + Time = Father time Deity + Wolf = Fenrir Deity + Bird/Roc/Eagle = Garuda Deity + Big = Giant Deity + Leaf/Plant/Grass = Green man Deity + Death = Grim reaper Deity + House = Heaven Deity + Fox = Kitsune Deity + Lion = Maahes Deity + Island/Archipelago/Angler = Maui Deity + Hammer = Mj√∂lnir Deity + Mountain = Mount olympus Deity + Gift = Pandora's box Deity + Water/Ocean/Sea = Poseidon Deity + Snake/Rainforest = Quetzalcoatl Deity + Sun/Day = Ra Deity + Rainbow/Double rainbow/Oasis/Rain = Rainbow serpent Deity + Monkey = Sun wukong Deity + Hippo = Taweret Deity + Storm/Lightning = Thor Deity + Warrior = Valkyrie Deity + Fire/Volcano/Metal/Steel = Vulcan Deity + Turtle = World turtle Deity + Sky/Mount olympus = Zeus
